alert.note: Alert for Los Angeles County Mountains excluding the Santa Monica Range (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued February 16 at 9:24AM PST until February 17 at 3:00PM PST by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 3 PM PST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Northeast winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. Isolated gusts to 60 mph in the western San Gabriels. * WHERE...Los Angeles County Mountains excluding the Santa Monica Range. * WHEN...From midnight tonight to 3 PM PST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds could blow down large objects such as trees and power lines. Power outages are possible. Travel could be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Los Angeles County Mountains excluding the Santa Monica Range
